title: Low priority queue
body: Ok look I am in low priority queue and I am waiting 20min but, there is a problem. When I wait 20min the low priority queue the logo when your in low priority queue will disappear and it will stop finding match and say find match on the bottom and, I need to wait 20min again what is this

replies.body: It almost sounds like that LPQ timer is actually resetting on you?? That'd be pretty shitty tbh. Double check your network really quick to make sure it isn't resetting due to a hiccup in your connection by going through the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). If that doesn't seem to help with the timer, take a screenshot of where it's resetting and shoot it over in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
Did the stuff in connection guide! It's now working. Thank you!
Hello. I'm also experiencing this. Here's a picture. Thanks. https://imgur.com/gallery/VjQX3
